Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2017 06:37PM Jennifer78 wrote: I'm so sorry you are going through this. A week before my 39th birthday I had a diagnostic mammogram which lead to an ultrasound. I had a 1.2 cm hypoechoic lump with indistinct margins, BiRads 4. Google was not my friend and I truly was becoming paralyzed with fear. I have two young boys and cried every time I looked at them. I was recently told it was benign. Please try not to let fear get the best of you. Prayer for a good outcome.
Posts.Title: Suspicious mammogram, waiting for biopsy, very scared TartletMom cattledoglv
